name: DRLLVINATION 👁
description:
DRLLVINATION is an attempt at divination through/with gameplay!

I made this game for the LD48 compo (48 hours jam) and I was very short on time, so the game lacks context-giving (and also audio) so let me explain what’s going on:

  • Every time you stomp a certain number of enemies, (look to the right side of the screen) you get a random new omen, represented by a shape.
  • The shapes you were given will appear above the enemies and define their attack behavior.
  • Whether you get a full divination or die before that, the gameover screen will offer you a compiled divination based on the omens you were given.
  • You win after you get a full divination with 5 omens, or you lose when you have no more health, health fills back up as you get deeper.

Controls:

  • arrow keys
  • OR w a s d
  • ‘enter’ key for starting over
  • ‘escape’ closes the game

Here is the Ludum Dare page for this game.

This game was made with my engine SUGAR🍬!
